description: A vulnerability was found in Asus RT-N12E 2.0.0.19. It has been classified as problematic. Affected is an unknown function of the file sysinfo.asp. The manipulation of the argument SSID leads to cross site scripting. It is possible to launch the attack remotely. The exploit has been disclosed to the public and may be used. The vendor was contacted early about this disclosure but did not respond in any way.
